articles.description: Man United have become a club that drains the talent out of their best players and, as Tuesday's loss proved, nothing changes until that changes.
articles.content: MANCHESTER, England -- You know the script by now: Manchester United play a big game, their star players fail to perform as they are outfought and outthought by their opponents and, as surely as nigh… [+5138 chars]

articles.title: 'Virat gave me the trophy and said 'here, this is for you'': India batter recalls Kohli's warm gesture in debut series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The 31-year-old India batter has so far featured in 21 Tests, in which he has accumulated 1488 runs at an average of 41.33. | Cricket
